name: stock-analysis-app
description: AI-powered multi-agent stock analysis with Ollama LLM integration for institutional-quality insights

scripts.dev:manual: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup:ollama: curl -fsSL https://ollama.ai/install.sh | sh && ollama pull llama4:maverick
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend

author: Your Name
